T04sanss11u:1: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ //
T04sanss11u:3: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
T04sanss11u:4: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam anuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
T04sanss11u:5: ye kāma varjenti yathâgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
T04sanss11u:6: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ //
T04sanss11u:7: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇâsīd anāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
T04sanss11u:11: jyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
T04sanss11u:12: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām //
T04sanss11u:14: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
T04sanss11u:15: nôpasthitā bhonti narôttamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān //
T04sanss11u:16: yaś câiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvârtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
T04sanss11u:17: araṇyâbhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
T04sanss11u:18: yadi punar visabhāgasatvânunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhâdikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
T04sanss11u:21: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
T04sanss11u:22: mamântike cêti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam //
T04sanss11u:23: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
T04sanss11u:24: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ //
T04sanss11u:25: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
T04sanss11u:26: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ //
T04sanss11u:27: sahadhārmikeno vacanenôktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ câpratyayaṃ ca /
T04sanss11u:28: prāviṣkarontîmi bāladharmêmam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti //
T04sanss11u:29: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathâmedhyenâmedhya sārddham /
T04sanss11u:30: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe //
T04sanss11u:32: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyâpriya nâsti kahiṃcit /
T04sanss11u:33: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
T04sanss11u:36: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yathêva vrajanti //
T04sanss11u:38: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
T04sanss11u:39: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ nô ca priyâpriya vidyati saṃgo //
T04sanss11u:40: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
T04sanss11u:41: antôbhe 'pi tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme //
T04sanss11u:43: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
T04sanss11u:46: kadāci yuktayogîmi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
T04sanss11u:47: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
T04sanss11u:48: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
T04sanss11u:49: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sadôpaśāntarato vivekacārī /
T04sanss11u:50: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
T04sanss11u:51: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
T04sanss11u:52: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'syêmi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve //
T04sanss11u:54: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
T04sanss11u:55: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram /
T04sanss11u:60: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntêndriyāḥ sūratāḥ //
T04sanss11u:61: na strīsaṃbhava nâiva câpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
T04sanss11u:63: lābhair nâpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
T04sanss11u:67: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayâikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānîty ādi //
T04sanss11u:68: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhâdau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sâivâikaḥ /
T04sanss11u:71: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatôdakârṇavenôhyamānôdakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
T04sanss11u:72: evam eva kāśyapêhâike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
T04sanss11u:79: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nâtidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati na
T04sanss11u:82: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpâyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yā-
T04sanss11u:84: ni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
T04sanss11u:87: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya
T04sanss11u:88: svâdhyāyati nâtyuccena svareṇa nâtinīcena nôddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena
T04sanss11u:89: prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
T04sanss11u:90: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vôpasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vânye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
T04sanss11u:97: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
T04sanss11u:99: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntêndriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanôpasaṃhartavyā /
T04sanss11u:102: sacet saṃvegânukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārôdārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
T04sanss11u:104: sâivaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
T04sanss11u:105: te ca satvās tasyântike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti //
T04sanss11u:108: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye prativasatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:117: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyârthāyâraṇye prativasāmi sa mayârthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyârthaḥ //
T04sanss11u:119: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:132: anitye nityêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nātmany ātmêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto /
T04sanss11u:138: śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto
T04sanss11u:142: tâibhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo bhīto 'raṇyâvāsam upagataḥ //
T04sanss11u:144: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:145: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhatôtpadyante //
T04sanss11u:147: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nâtmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nâtmâbhiniveśaṃ nâtmaparigrahaṃ nâtmanidānaṃ nâtmatṛṣṇāṃ nâtmasaṃjñāṃ nâtmavādôpādānaṃ
T04sanss11u:151: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nâsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
T04sanss11u:154: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ //
T04sanss11u:156: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nôttrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
T04sanss11u:157: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā
T04sanss11u:161: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ yoniśaḥ kāyôpaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
T04sanss11u:162: nâsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
T04sanss11u:166: evam evâmamenâparigraheṇâraṇyam eva sarvadharmêti jñātvôpasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:170: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhânujñāto 'raṇyavāsêti jñātvâraṇye vastavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:174: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatvôddeśasvâdhyāyârthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
T04sanss11u:175: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenâcāryôpādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu
T04sanss11u:176: bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam analasena svayaṃkāriṇâparôpatāpinā na ca tenôpasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:178: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya sa-
T04sanss11u:180: mārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
T04sanss11u:181: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti / kiṃ-
T04sanss11u:184: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanss11u:185: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
T04sanss11u:187: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmânugraho naśyati /
T04sanss11u:188: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss11u:192: vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmântikaṃ śayanâsanam āgacchet tena sâyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya
T04sanss11u:194: sacet punar asya parapratibaddhôddeśaḥ svâdhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatâraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:195: eṣâiva tasyâraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā câtṛptêti //
T04sanss11u:197: yadi punar asya tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgâgaccheyuḥ /
T04sanss11u:198: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsôtpādayitavyaḥ /
T04sanss11u:203: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
T04sanss11u:204: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
T04sanss11u:206: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss11u:207: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayâmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti //
T04sanss11u:208: pe //yadi punas tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'manuṣyôpasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
T04sanss11u:213: tatra tenâraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmâdhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ-
T04sanss11u:216: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sâraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
T04sanss11u:217: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyâśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
T04sanss11u:219: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadâdhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
T04sanss11u:222: pe //tena tatrâraṇyâyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:224: yathâiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
T04sanss11u:227: evam evâyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsôpamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyôtpadyate /
T04sanss11u:229: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramârthata*utpadyate vā nirudhyate vêti //
T04sanss11u:233: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
T04sanss11u:234: api tu khalu punaḥ santîme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittâśayaṃ jānanti /
T04sanss11u:236: so 'ham ihâraṇyâyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
T04sanss11u:237: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgatâiko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:238: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vâkuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
T04sanss11u:240: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantîti //
